page.title: 15Sports Day at Parkend School
page.content:
On Tuesday 9th July 1985 at 2 p.m. it is our school Sports Day .All of our parents come up to watch .All of the take part in some events.we do an Egg and spoon race were we run with a pot egg on a spoon.Lots of us drop the egg before we reach the finish line .Wearenot allowed to touch the egg with our fingers I enjoy the three legged race where two people are tied together by their legs.I was tied to my friend Rachel Morgan . We also have running races , relays, obstacle races and wheelbarrow races.
Anouska Leppier
Aged 9 Years.
